power.title: Battle Fury Stance
power.fluff: You throw your full weight into each attack, ruining your defenses but scoring a crippling blow with each strike
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Battle Fury stance.
true While you remain in the stance, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with Weapon attacks and melee and close Fighter attacks, but suffer a -2 penalty to AC.
true 1 Level 11: +4 power bonus to damage rolls.
true 1 Level 21: +6 power bonus to damage rolls.
Special: This stance immediately ends when you spend a healing surge or use total defense.
You can end this stance as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Battle Leader
power.fluff: Your leadership experience lets you enable nearby allies to move safely through combat

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst

power.section: true Effect: Target allies can shift up to 1 square as a free interrupt, or up to 2 squares if they start or end the shift adjacent to you.
Level 21: Shift up to 2 squares or 3 squares, respectively.
true You then shift up to 1 square.
Level 21:Shift up to 2 squares.

power.title: Boundless Endurance Stance
power.fluff: You shake off the worst of your wounds
power.section: true Effect: If you are bloodied, you regain hit points equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
true You enter the Boundless Endurance stance.
true While you remain in the stance, you have regeneration when you are bloodied. The regeneration equals 2 + your Constitution modifier and is not suppressed by any damage types.

power.title: Close the Gap
power.fluff: As your foe falls, you quickly move on to challenge a new enemy
power.section: Trigger: An enemy marked by you and within your reach drops to 0 hit points or less
true Effect: You move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
true You can mark one enemy that is within your reach. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Create Opening
power.fluff: You draw your enemy's attention, allowing an ally to slip away
power.section: true Effect: You mark the target, and provoke a reactive strike from it. You have a +2 bonus to defenses against this attack.
true After the reactive strike has been resolved, choose one ally adjacent to the target:
true 1 If the attack was a hit, the ally can shift his or her speed as a free reaction.
true 1 If the attack was a miss, the ally can move his or her speed as a free reaction.

power.title: Crowd Fighting
power.fluff: You roll with your foe's feeble attack, causing it to lash out at another nearby enemy
power.section: Prerequisite: You must have training in Streetwise.
Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature adjacent to you other than the triggering enemy

power.section: true Effect: The target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, or 4 + your Dexterity modifier if it is within the triggering enemy's reach.
true 1 Level 11: 3 + your Dexterity modifier damage or 8 + your Dexterity modifier damage, respectively.
true 1 Level 21: 6 + your Dexterity modifier damage or 12 + your Dexterity modifier damage, respectively.

power.title: Defensive Stance
power.fluff: Dropping into a cautious stance, you maneuver around your opponent's attacks to get into position
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Defensive stance.
true While you remain in the stance, you are slowed and gain a +4 power bonus to AC.
true 1 Shield: If you are wielding a shield, you also gain a +4 power bonus to Reflex.
true In addition, you can use the following action at-will:
true 1 Opportunity Reaction: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack; You shift 1 square, or 2 squares to a space adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Special: You can end this stance as a free action during your turn, but not on the same turn that you activated it.

power.title: Eldritch Tactics
power.fluff: Using your talent for teleportation, you take an ally's place
power.section: Prerequisite: You must be eladrin.

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and one ally in the burst

power.section: 1 Fey Step: If you know the fey step racial power and it is not expended, this power is Closeburst 5 instead.
true Effect: Each target teleports, swapping positions.

true If one target has a larger space than the other, the smaller target teleports into a position of your choice within the larger target's original space, and the larger target teleports into a position of your choice that fully covers the smaller target's original space.

power.title: Forceful Drag
power.fluff: You dig your fingers into a foe and drag the struggling opponent across the battlefield
power.section: Requirement: You must have a creature grabbed.
true Effect: You move up to your speed. For each square you move, you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
true The target remains grabbed, and you do not provoke a reactive strike from it for this movement.
true At the end of the move, you can end the grab to knock the target prone and slide it up to 1 square.

power.title: Full Extension
power.fluff: You lunge forward, hitting a spot well beyond where your foes thought you could reach
power.section: true Effect: The reach of the next melee Weapon attack you make before the end of your current turn increases by 1.

power.title: Get Out of There
power.fluff: You pull one of your allies into a more advantageous position
power.section: true Effect: You slide the target up to 2 squares to a space adjacent to you. You can slide the target through your own space.

power.title: Glowering Threat
power.fluff: Your intimidating glare distracts your enemies as they attempt to attack your allies
power.section: true Effect: Each target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against any creature other than you. This penalty lasts until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Mighty Leap
power.fluff: You gather your strength for a truly impressive jump
power.section: true Effect: Until the end of your current turn, you gain the following benefits:
true 1 You gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks to jump.
true 1 Any jump you make is considered to have a running start.
true 1 You can use Athletics instead of Acrobatics to reduce falling damage.
Special: You can also use this power as a free interrupt with the following trigger and effect:
1 Trigger: You fall
1 Effect: You use Athletics instead of Acrobatics to reduce the damage from the triggering fall.

power.title: Minor Resurgence
power.fluff: Your ability to withstand hardship grants you a temporary boost in combat
power.section: true Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Mobile Strikes Stance
power.fluff: The force of your strikes lets you sprint away from your foe
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Mobile Strikes stance.
true While you remain in the stance, each time you hit an enemy with an at-will Weapon attack, you can move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as a free reaction.

power.title: No Opening
power.fluff: You raise your weapon or shield to block an opening in your defenses
power.section: Trigger: An enemy attacks you and has combat advantage for the attack
true Effect: You don't grant combat advantage to the triggering enemy until the end of its current turn.

power.title: Perfect Pass
power.fluff: With perfect timing, you slip by your foe without dropping your guard
power.section: true Effect: Choose an enemy you can see, and move up to your speed to a space adjacent to it. This movement does not provoke reactive strikes from the chosen enemy.

power.title: Push Forward
power.fluff: Through careful timing and balanced footwork, you avoid your enmies' attacks as you advance
power.section: Effect: You shift up to 3 squares to a space adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Quick Escape
power.fluff: You quickly try to shake off whatever's holding you
power.section: true Effect: You make an escape attempt, or make a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes or restrains you, even if it is not an effect that a save can end.

power.title: Shielded Sides
power.fluff: You whirl with your shield, concentrating on closing any holes in your defense
power.section: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex, and cannot be flanked.

catalog.power:
Shielding Shove Fighter Utility 22 You shove an ally out of harms way with your shield Encounter Martial Immediate Interrupt
Requirement: You must be using a shield.
Trigger: An enemy attacks an ally adjacent to you
Target:Melee1the triggering ally
true Effect: You push the target up to 3 squares.
true If the triggering enemy is within your reach, you mark it until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Shrewd Repositioning
power.fluff: An enemy's attack lands, but you spot a way to better your tactics
power.section: Trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack
true Effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.
true Until the end of your next turn, you have a +2 bonus to AC against the triggering enemy.
true 1 Shield: If you are using a shield, the bonus also applies to your Reflex.

power.title: Sidestep Maneuver
power.fluff: The enemy closes to strike, but you duck and ready a nasty counterstrike
power.section: Trigger: An enemy ends its move in a square adjacent to you
true Effect: You shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
true You gain a +2 power bonus to your first attack roll against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Single Out
power.fluff: Your fury in battle causes a nearby foe to quake with fear

section.name: Target:
section.target: one enemy that can see you

power.section: true Effect: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

true If you scored a critical hit or reduced a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less on this turn, the enemy also grants combat advantage on the first attack by an ally before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Snagging Grip
power.fluff: When you're knocked off balance, you grab hold of the enemy in front of you and bring it staggering along with you
power.section: Trigger: You are knocked prone or forced to move
true Effect: If you were forced to move, for each square moved, you pull the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.
true If you were knocked prone, you knock the target prone.

power.title: Sudden Sprint
power.fluff: You put on a burst of speed as you launch yourself toward a foe
power.section: Effect: You move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier to a square adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Unstoppable Advance Stance
power.fluff: You swing with such fury that your foes are steadily driven back with each blow
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Unstoppable Advance stance.
true While you remain in the stance, whenever you hit any creature with a melee Weapon attack, you can push that creature up to 1 square and can shift up to 1 square to a square the creature vacated.

power.title: Who's Next?
power.fluff: When the foe crumples, you move forward to find your next foe
power.section: Requirement: You must have reduced a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less during this turn.
Effect: You shift up to your speed.
You gain a bonus to your first damage roll before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals the number of squares you moved from your starting position.
Reaver Training: If you have Reaver Training, you can also use this power as a free reaction with the following trigger in place of the requirement:
1 Trigger: You reduce a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points or less with your enforce challenge
